About Dr.Ebadian

BEFORE & AFTER

A Blend Of Science And Art

Description: Achieving beauty in dentistry requires more than just artistry and taste; treatments should be performed systematically. In this case, attention has been given not only to the aesthetic aspects but also to functional factors such as the length of the dental crowns and the patient's occlusal relationship.

A Blend Of Science And Art

Treatment : Composite veneers

Number of units : 24 units, upper and lower jaw

Color : A2

Minimal Treatments - Maximal Achievements

Description: Some treatments, while not involving complex stages and being relatively easy to perform, yield significant results. In this case, an extraordinary transformation was achieved using only composite veneers on six teeth, greatly enhancing the patient's smile.

Minimal Treatments - Maximal Achievements

Treatment : Composite veneers

Number of units : 6 units, front 3-3

Color : A2

Combined Treatments

Combined Treatments
Description: These patients require a combination of treatments for their dental abnormalities. In this case, a significant number of missing teeth have been replaced with dental implants and full ceramic crowns. To ensure the color of the remaining teeth matches the new full ceramic crowns, ceramic veneers have also been applied.

Combined Treatments

Treatment : Combination of implant treatment, ceramic veneers, full ceramic crowns

Number of units : Entire upper and lower jaw

Color : A1

Dental Services

Soft Tissue Management

Soft Tissue Management

Soft tissue management improves the health and aesthetics of gums. At Dr. Ebadian's Dental Clinic, we provide gum inflammation treatments and soft tissue grafting to keep your smile beautiful.

Read More

Ceramic and Composite Veneers

Ceramic and Composite Veneers

Enhance your smile with Dr. Ebadian's ceramic and composite veneers. Discover the natural beauty and durability of ceramic veneers or the affordable and quick option of composite veneers. Contact us for expert advice and pricing details.

Read More

Fixed Dental Prosthetics

Fixed Dental Prosthetics

Discover the benefits of fixed dental prosthetics with Dr. Ebadian. Offering a natural look and reliable function, our advanced solutions provide a long-term fix for missing teeth. Contact us for details on costs and benefits.

Read More

Restorative Dentistry

Restorative Dentistry

Restore broken or decayed teeth with advanced techniques at Dr. Ebadian's clinic. Achieve a healthy, beautiful smile with our expert restorative dentistry services.

Read More

Cosmetic Dentistry

Cosmetic Dentistry

Transform your smile with Dr. Ebadian’s Clinic. Explore expert cosmetic dentistry services like teeth whitening, crowns, and implants. Achieve a brighter, more confident smile. Contact us today!

Read More

Biomimetic Dentistry

Biomimetic Dentistry

Discover biomimetic dentistry—an innovative method that preserves and restores your natural teeth. With over 20 years of expertise, Dr. Ebadian provides advanced care for healthier and more youthful-looking teeth.

Read More

Restoring Your Teeth

Restoring Your Teeth

.Restorative treatments for tooth decay vary in complexity based on severity, including fillings with amalgam, composite, or ceramic resins, and may require procedures like root canals or implants for extensive damage

Read More

Root Canal Treatment

Root Canal Treatment

For expert root canal treatment and root canal therapy, visit Dr. Ebadian's clinic. Get a free consultation, professional care, and competitive pricing today.

Read More

Gum surgery

Gum surgery

Gums play a crucial role in oral health and are essential in maintaining and enhancing the beauty of your smile. When gums suffer from disease or asymmetry, not only does the appearance of your smile deteriorate, but the health of your teeth is also compromised. Gum surgery can be a solution to these problems, restoring balance to your mouth and teeth.

Read More

Orthodentics

Orthodentics

.Invisible orthodontics is ideal for those worried about traditional braces' appearance. Dr. Ebadian’s clinic offers free consultations and personalized treatment plans for optimal care

Read More

Dental Implant & Surgery

Dental Implant & Surgery

Get natural-looking, long-lasting dental implants at Dr. Ebadian's clinic. Enjoy advanced techniques and personalized care for a confident smile. Contact us today for a quote!

Read More

Dental aesthetics

Dental aesthetics

.Laminates are dental coverings that enhance teeth appearance and can last up to ten years with proper care, but may need replacement after several years

About

Dr. Mohammad Taghi Ebadian

Dr. Ebadian Dental Clinic, with over 20 years of experience, is committed to providing exceptional dental care. Our clinic prides itself on employing highly skilled specialists and staff to deliver the best therapeutic methods. We focus on modern, advanced techniques while maintaining a proper therapeutic culture and the right attitude towards treatment. Patient-Centered Approach Our patient-centered approach emphasizes the importance of communication. We ensure that patients fully understand their medical conditions and the available treatment options. This clarity helps set reasonable expectations and enables patients to participate actively in their treatment plans. Teamwork and Communication Teamwork is at the core of our practice. Our specialists collaborate closely, ensuring comprehensive and coordinated care. This approach enhances the quality of our treatments and ensures all aspects of patient care are considered. For more information and to connect with Dr. Ebadian, please visit various websites and resources that provide details about his work.

20 years of experience

Dr. Mohammad Taghi Ebadian

Dr. Mohammad Taghi Ebadian is a distinguished dentist and implant surgeon with a Master’s degree in Dental Implants from the University of Münster, Germany. Specializing in cosmetic dentistry and various dental surgeries, he is recognized as a leading specialist in his field. Dr. Ebadian has shared his extensive experiences through numerous media interviews, including with Jam-e-Jam.
